verses.text_plain: But God came to Abimelech in a dream by night, and said to him, Behold, thou art but a dead man, for the woman which thou hast taken; for she is a man’s wife.
verses.verse_html:
3But God came to Abimelech in a dream by night, and said to him, Behold, thou art but a dead man, for the woman which thou hast taken; for she is a man’s wife. ▼
▼ a man’s…: Heb. married to an husband

tokens.definition: אִשָּׁה ʼishshâh, ish-shaw'; feminine of H376 or H582 ; irregular plural, נָשִׁים nâshîym;(used in the same wide sense as H582 ) a woman:—(adulter) ess, each, every, female, × many, none, one, together, wife, woman. Often unexpressed in English.
